segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that single dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water! It's running non-stop from the faucet, completely overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady sheet of water is pouring down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a rapidly expanding puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's actually standing right in it, with one foot clearly submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice this growing flood?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains utterly neutral, as if nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is truly astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is slowly turning into a small indoor pond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the damage this water is causing to the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She really needs to turn that faucet off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water keeps flowing, utterly ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR
